alert.note: Alert for Harding; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 14 at 10:27AM MDT until April 14 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING WILL END AT NOON MDT TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL THEN BE IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Conditions will gradually improve today, however northwest winds gusting around 45 mph will create areas of blowing snow through this afternoon. * WHERE...Harding County and Perkins County. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until noon MDT today. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from noon until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility at times. Snow blowing across the roads could create small drifts and slippery spots.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
